description.narrative: '1. Project area: Hanoi, Nghe An and Quang Binh 2. Project Target objects: -Women who are workers in sensitive service businesses (Bars, Discos, Hotels, Motels, etc.) - Women and children who are domestic workers. - Women and children who are migrant and freelance workers. + People are living with HIV will be our priority. 3. Project objectives - Objective 1: Raising Legal awareness on basic rights in labour, employment, medical examination and treatment procedures (health insurance registration, medical examination and treatment), enrollment of the project#s object is improved so that they could exercise their rights. - Objective 2: Promoting access to the legal advice and legal support for project's objects when their basic rights are violated in the fieldof labour, employment, medical examination and treatment procedures (health insurance registration, medical examination and treatment), enrollment. 4. Project activities: - Activity 1: Conducting rapid assessment surveys on the level of understanding and the difficulties of the project target objects in Hanoi, Nghe An, Quang Binh. - Activity 2: Developing a toolkit for legal communication and guidance on legal advice, legal support skills. - Activity3: Organizing 03 TOT training courses on using the Toolkit for lawyers, lawyers, women in the target provinces in 03 project provinces. - Activity 4: Using the Toolkit to organize 22 legal communication trips (10 trips to Hanoi; 6 trips per provinceto Nghe An, Quang Binh) - Activity 5: Providing free legal advice and direct legal support for the project's target objects. - Activity 6: Providing free legal advice through telephone - Activity 7: Providing free legal advice through the website of the Center.

participating-org.narrative: 'CCLPHH works in health and HIV/AIDS, in particular: 1. Providing legal aid for people who are affected by HIV/AIDS, as well as poor people and beneficiaries of social welfare. 2. Communicating for laws and policies in relation to health and HIV/AIDS. 3. Participating in building and contributing to draft laws on health and HIV/AIDS. 4. Conducting scientific research in law and policy regarding Health, HIV/AIDS. 5. Implementing projects in the field of health and HIV/AIDS. 6. Carrying out other activities in accordance with Vietnam#s law
Center for Consulting on Legal and Policy on Health and HIV/AIDS (CCLP

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to social and political participation

description.narrative: Women and Men able to: # of people (M/F) living in poverty and injustice use their enhanced knowledge and skills to fullfill their rights on freedom of association, freedom of expression and to participate in public affairs.
men living in poverty and injustice use their enhanced knowledge and skills to fullfill their rights on freedom of association, freedom of expression and to participate in public affairs.

comment.narrative: Due to covid 19 pandemic happened seriously at project sites, CCLPHH couldn't implement activities as plan. They had to conduct it both in online and offline, however, the benefieries didnt have smart phone or internet so it dificulties for CCLPHH to provide information, capacity building, legal aid assistant to group of prostitutes, vendors, HIV, etc.
